function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Building optimization problems can lead to inaccurate energy consumption simulations if occupant behavior is ignored","Impact":"Inaccurate energy consumption predictions, leading to inefficient building design and management","Mitigation":"Consider and incorporate occupant behavior in building energy simulation studies","Technologies":"Data mining techniques for estimating occupant presence, modeling algorithms for occupant behavior","People":"Architects, building designers, energy managers","Owner":"Building design and energy management professionals"},{"Description":"Neglecting the presence of occupants in building energy simulations can lead to inaccurate results","Impact":"Inaccurate energy consumption predictions, leading to suboptimal building design and energy management","Mitigation":"Incorporate occupant presence and behavior in building energy simulation models","Technologies":"Occupant presence modeling algorithms, data mining techniques for occupant behavior","People":"Building energy simulation researchers, architects, building designers","Owner":"Building energy simulation researchers, building design professionals"}]}
